General:
- Playtesting times are now starting 1 hour earlier. Weekdays are 5PM PDT and weekends are 3PM PDT.
- Added in-game custom item builds support. Create your own builds or browse builds from the community in the heroes page.
- Added post game player reporting option
- Ally player glow-through-world silhouette now communicates their current health
- Added ambient music track
- Added unique {{Icon|Haze}} Haze footstep sound effects
- Fixed various issues with mic audio input and lag it introduced
- Small adjustments to how the crosshair UI area looks
- Mic input device is now selected from in-game settings rather than the steam client
- Improved various networking and hit registration related issues (this was released a couple days ago)
- Updated Trooper and Neutral shooting sound effects
- Various improvements to damage audio clarity for victims and attackers
- Sped up select Amber Hand VO that related to game state (shrines being under attack, protecting the urn runner etc)
- Adding game audio muted indicator in top left if the game is muted
- Camera can now be moved while the game is paused in replays
- Fixed the Rejuvenator falling during pause
- Fixed the Idol falling during pause
- Fixed the bottom most shop items having part of their icon be unclickable
- Fixed a few unit target abilities that could sometimes select a target behind a nearby wall (e.g. {{Icon|Bebop}} Bebop {{Icon|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb)
- Added some additional visual tells for the receiving end of {{Icon|Lash}} Lash’s {{Icon|Death Slam}} Death Slam
- Updated Bullet Shredder debuff effects
- Mid-Boss is now invulnerable if there are no enemies it can actually attack
- Fixed your active items not hiding in the UI when you are dead and spectating a team mate
- Added support for binding mouse1 and mouse2 to any key (this was released a couple days ago)
- Fixed various movement stuck bugs with {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy
- Added alt info to recent damage view to make it clearer that this can be brought up again after it disappears
- Improved {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta’s {{Icon|Stake}} Stake effects to make it a little clearer when you are affected
- Fixed upgrading {{Icon|McGinnis}} McGinnis’s {{Icon|Medicinal Specter}} Medicinal Specter to T3 while active causing it to heal everyone to full instantly
- Fixed a bug that could cause all of {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade’s pulses to go off at once
- Fixed {{Icon|Kelvin}} Kelvin’s Ice Beam sometimes not hitting Neutrals
- Fixed being able to see some things through the Veils in the map that you shouldn’t be able to see
- Removed stack of cardboard boxes inside connection hallway near bases to prevent cover from Neutrals
- Fixed getting stuck under stair at inner lanes near Guardian
- Fixed {{Icon|Abrams}} Abrams getting stuck on department store facade when using his ult
- Sapphire side materials tint color changed to white
- Sapphire side street materials changed to new asphalt blend
- Added new slide and reload animation for {{Icon|Wraith}} Wraith
- Out of combat run animation variants now only play during sprint state
- Fixed missing VO for {{Icon|Yamato}} Yamato ability use/upgrades
- Allies now compliment teammates when they see impressive use of channeled abilities (for instance, Gigawatt killing three people with {{Icon|Storm Cloud}} Storm Cloud)
- Adjusted timing of select {{Icon|Abrams}} Abrams impact lines to time with either the rise of his leap or the descent accordingly
- Improved visibility of {{Icon|Seven}} Seven’s bullet and travel path
- Improved visibility of {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox’s bullet and travel path
- Improved visibility of {{Icon|Wraith}} Wraith’s bullet and travel path
- Improved visibility of {{Icon|Haze}} Haze’s bullet and travel path
- Improved visibility of {{Icon|Lady Geist}} Lady Geist’s bullet and travel path
- Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {{Icon|Seven}} Seven’s gun
- Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox’s gun
- Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {{Icon|Wraith}} Wraith’s gun
Flying Cloak: - {{Icon|Flying Cloak}} Flying Cloak pathing improved, it will no longer bounce erratically off map geometry
Abilities:
- Fixed a few unit target abilities that could sometimes select a target behind a nearby wall (e.g. {{Icon|Bebop}} Bebop {{Icon|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb)
- Added some additional visual tells for the receiving end of {{Icon|Lash}} Lash’s {{Icon|Death Slam}} Death Slam
- Improved {{Icon|Vindicta}} Vindicta’s {{Icon|Stake}} Stake effects to make it a little clearer when you are affected
- Fixed upgrading {{Icon|McGinnis}} McGinnis’s {{Icon|Medicinal Specter}} Medicinal Specter to T3 while active causing it to heal everyone to full instantly
- Fixed a bug that could cause all of {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade’s pulses to go off at once
- Allies now compliment teammates when they see impressive use of channeled abilities (for instance, Gigawatt killing three people with {{Icon|Storm Cloud}} Storm Cloud)
- {{Icon|Siphon Life}} Siphon Life T1 and T2 swapped
- {{Icon|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb T3 changed from Silence to Disarm
- Improved {{Icon|Hook}} Hook hitbox detection to not grab targets that are behind cover
- {{Icon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl Spirit scaling reduced from 2.2 to 1.2
- {{Icon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl T3 changed from +200 damage to "Kills enemy heroes below 20%". Low health enemies are highlighted while guiding the owl.
- {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger no longer breaks invisibility when cast (previously was part of the T3)
- {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger Spirit scaling increased from 2.3 to 2.6
- {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger no longer gets +140 damage with the T3
- {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger T3 is now "-30% Damage Penalty On Victim for 4s after wakeup"
- {{Icon|Bullet Dance}} Bullet Dance cast time increased from 0.7s to 0.8s
- {{Icon|Bullet Dance}} Bullet Dance evasion from 70% to 50%
- {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb duration increased from 3.5s to 4s
- {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb T2 duration increased from +1.5s to +2s
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant Replicated Healing increased from 50% to 65%
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant Fire Rate reduced from 20% to 15%
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant T1 changed to +15% Rate
- {{Icon|Frost Grenade}} Frost Grenade cooldown reduced from 26s to 23s
- While {{Icon|Ice Path}} Ice Pathing you no longer slow down when you shoot your gun
- {{Icon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam Channel move speed increased from 4 to 6
- {{Icon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam T1 changed from "+2 Channel Move Speed" to -8s Cooldown
- {{Icon|Soul Exchange}} Soul Exchange cast time reduced from 0.65s to 0.5s
- Fixed {{Icon|Malice}} Malice clipping aggressively against map geometry edges
- {{Icon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike base Damage Per Meter reduced from 8 to 6
- Fixed some cases with {{Icon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike not hitting units positioned just below the impact zone
- {{Icon|Flog}} Flog angle increased from 20 degrees to 30 degrees
- {{Icon|Flog}} Flog cooldown reduced from 35s to 30s
- {{Icon|Scorn}} Scorn healing against non-heroes reduced from 1x to 0.7x
- {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine Max Damage Amp reduced from 125% to 100%
- {{Icon|Paradox}} {{Icon|Paradoxical Swap}} Paradoxical Swap range reduced from 45m to 40m
- {{Icon|Barrage}} Barrage T3 added, now heals {{Icon|Pocket}} Pocket for 100% of its damage (33% vs non-heroes)
- Fixed some issues with {{Icon|Barrage}} Barrage projectiles getting caught on map geometry
- {{Icon|Flying Cloak}} Flying Cloak pathing improved, it will no longer bounce erratically off map geometry
- {{Icon|Flight}} Flight T3 reduced from +4m/s to +3m/s
- {{Icon|Crow Familiar}} Crow Familiar T3 improved from -30% Healing Suppression to -40%
- {{Icon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask travel speed increased from 800 to 1000
- {{Icon|Royal Flush}} Royal Flush no longer has a cast delay
- {{Icon|Royal Flush}} Royal Flush time to spawn cards increased from 0.4s to 0.6s
- {{Icon|Telekinesis}} Telekinesis no longer allows the victim to shoot back
- Shadow Explosion renamed to {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation and reworked into a new ability
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation no longer has radius impact behavior
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation now gives you 4.5s of invulnerability after the initial 2s invulnerable channel period. You transform and refresh your abilities, improving ability speeds by 60% and gaining unlimited ammo. "Ability Speeds" affects {{Icon|Power Slash}} Power Slash cast time, {{Icon|Flying Strike}} Flying Strike flying time, and {{Icon|Crimson Slash}} Crimson Slash cast time.
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation cooldown increased from 90s to 100s
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation T2 is now +4 m/s during Shadow Form
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation T3 is now +1s duration

- Cooldown reduced from 14s to 9s

- Now displays its current number of charges on its active icon

- Health increased from 50 to 75
- Spirit Amp increased from 8% to 12%
- Duration of no damage taken requirement reduced from 5s to 4s

- Flat portion of the lifesteal increased from 90 to 110
- Spirit bonus reduced from 6 to 5
- Now grants +2 Sprint
- Stun duration starts after hitting the ground

- Max Bullet Resist increased from 30% to 36%

- When below 40% HP you now gain 25% Spirit Resist

Escalating Resilience: - Max Bullet Resist increased from 30% to 36%
Lifestrike: - Flat portion of the lifesteal increased from 90 to 110
Hook: - Improved {{Icon|Hook}} Hook hitbox detection to not grab targets that are behind cover
Ivy:
- Fixed various movement stuck bugs with {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy
- {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb duration increased from 3.5s to 4s
- {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb T2 duration increased from +1.5s to +2s
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant Replicated Healing increased from 50% to 65%
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant Fire Rate reduced from 20% to 15%
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant T1 changed to +15% Rate
Ground Strike:
- {{Icon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike base Damage Per Meter reduced from 8 to 6
- Fixed some cases with {{Icon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike not hitting units positioned just below the impact zone
Scorn: - {{Icon|Scorn}} Scorn healing against non-heroes reduced from 1x to 0.7x
Paradox:
- Fixed a bug that could cause all of {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade’s pulses to go off at once
- Improved visibility of {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox’s bullet and travel path
- Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox’s gun
- {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine Max Damage Amp reduced from 125% to 100%
- {{Icon|Paradox}} {{Icon|Paradoxical Swap}} Paradoxical Swap range reduced from 45m to 40m
Kinetic Carbine: - {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine Max Damage Amp reduced from 125% to 100%
Warden: - {{Icon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask travel speed increased from 800 to 1000
Alchemical Flask: - {{Icon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask travel speed increased from 800 to 1000
Misc:
- Adjusted map around the middle lanes to have an area with Veils for laning
- Hero kill bounty ratio between Killer and Assister reduced from 2.75x to 2.55x (means slightly more to the Assister)
- Spirit scaling reduced by ~15% (the total effective Spirit damage is reduced by less than this, this is just the Spirit multiplier scaling portion and has largest impact on late game burst)
- Unclaimed souls now convert 10% slower
- Vaults base bounty increased from 220 to 260
- Strong Neutrals Spirit Resist increased from 25% to 35%
- Medium Neutrals Spirit Resist increased from 25% to 30%
- Starting at 15 minutes, one melee Trooper per wave will spawn with 1.75x health
- Medic Trooper health increased from 240 to 260
- Sidelane Veils near Guardians are now one-way visibility (used to be blocked visibility in both directions)
- Neutrals can now lean side to side to fire when obstructed by map geometry and being attacked
- Zipline Boost ability speed increased from 100% to 130%
- Zipline Boost ability ramp time to reach max speed reduced from 2s to 1s
- Zipline base speed boost after Base Guardians are killed increased from 100% to 120%
- Zipline base speed boost's ramp time after Base Guardians are killed reduced from 5s to 4s
- Being Disarmed no longer prevents you from reloading
Crow Familiar: - {{Icon|Crow Familiar}} Crow Familiar T3 improved from -30% Healing Suppression to -40%
Mystic Burst:
- No longer has +1 HP Regen
- Now grants +1 Sprint
- Cooldown reduced from 8s to 6s
Mystic Shot: - Now requires that shotguns middle pellet hit the target
Silence Glyph:
- Moved from T2 to T3
- Health increased from 50 to 75
- Spirit Amp increased from 8% to 12%
Majestic Leap:
- Duration of no damage taken requirement reduced from 5s to 4s
- Now gives +75 Health
Improved Burst: - Damage reduced from 11% Max HP to 10%
Frenzy: - When below 40% HP you now gain 25% Spirit Resist
Sticky Bomb:
- Fixed a few unit target abilities that could sometimes select a target behind a nearby wall (e.g. {{Icon|Bebop}} Bebop {{Icon|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb)
- {{Icon|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb T3 changed from Silence to Disarm
Ice Path: - While {{Icon|Ice Path}} Ice Pathing you no longer slow down when you shoot your gun
Sleep Dagger:
- {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger no longer breaks invisibility when cast (previously was part of the T3)
- {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger Spirit scaling increased from 2.3 to 2.6
- {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger no longer gets +140 damage with the T3
- {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger T3 is now "-30% Damage Penalty On Victim for 4s after wakeup"
Soul Exchange: - {{Icon|Soul Exchange}} Soul Exchange cast time reduced from 0.65s to 0.5s
Medicinal Specter: - Fixed upgrading {{Icon|McGinnis}} McGinnis’s {{Icon|Medicinal Specter}} Medicinal Specter to T3 while active causing it to heal everyone to full instantly
Pulse Grenade: - Fixed a bug that could cause all of {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade’s pulses to go off at once
Pulse: - Fixed a bug that could cause all of {{Icon|Paradox}} Paradox {{Icon|{{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade}} {{Icon|Pulse}} Pulse Grenade’s pulses to go off at once
Wraith:
- Added new slide and reload animation for {{Icon|Wraith}} Wraith
- Improved visibility of {{Icon|Wraith}} Wraith’s bullet and travel path
- Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {{Icon|Wraith}} Wraith’s gun
- {{Icon|Royal Flush}} Royal Flush no longer has a cast delay
- {{Icon|Royal Flush}} Royal Flush time to spawn cards increased from 0.4s to 0.6s
- {{Icon|Telekinesis}} Telekinesis no longer allows the victim to shoot back
Combat Barrier:
- Bullet Shield increased from 275 to 300
- Weapon Damage while Shielded from 20% to 24%
Siphon Life: - {{Icon|Siphon Life}} Siphon Life T1 and T2 swapped
Kudzu Bomb:
- {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb duration increased from 3.5s to 4s
- {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb T2 duration increased from +1.5s to +2s
Watcher's Covenant:
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant Replicated Healing increased from 50% to 65%
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant Fire Rate reduced from 20% to 15%
- {{Icon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant T1 changed to +15% Rate
Arctic Beam:
- {{Icon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam Channel move speed increased from 4 to 6
- {{Icon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam T1 changed from "+2 Channel Move Speed" to -8s Cooldown
Paradoxical Swap: - {{Icon|Paradox}} {{Icon|Paradoxical Swap}} Paradoxical Swap range reduced from 45m to 40m
Royal Flush:
- {{Icon|Royal Flush}} Royal Flush no longer has a cast delay
- {{Icon|Royal Flush}} Royal Flush time to spawn cards increased from 0.4s to 0.6s
Telekinesis: - {{Icon|Telekinesis}} Telekinesis no longer allows the victim to shoot back
Shadow Transformation:
- Shadow Explosion renamed to {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation and reworked into a new ability
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation no longer has radius impact behavior
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation now gives you 4.5s of invulnerability after the initial 2s invulnerable channel period. You transform and refresh your abilities, improving ability speeds by 60% and gaining unlimited ammo. "Ability Speeds" affects {{Icon|Power Slash}} Power Slash cast time, {{Icon|Flying Strike}} Flying Strike flying time, and {{Icon|Crimson Slash}} Crimson Slash cast time.
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation cooldown increased from 90s to 100s
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation T2 is now +4 m/s during Shadow Form
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation T3 is now +1s duration
